name: Lag Tha Magma
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50.
Jam page here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/lag-tha-magma

-=LAG THA MAGMA=- . HOW TO PLAY . Dig holes and build walls to protect your Tower from the lava for as long as possible . CONTROLS A/W/D : Left/Jump/Right MOUSE CLICK : Dig/Build adjacent blocks MOUSE WHEEL : Zoom in/out R : Start Game F12 : Maximise screen (V1.1 only) ESC : Quit to DOS . BUILD BLOCKS You get a build block when you dig. You can only carry a max of 5 build blocks at a time. See top right corner of screen. No limit on digging. . Made with Godot, C#, Aseprite, Paint.Net, BFXR . . CHANGE LOG: V1.1: Fix FullScreen/Resizing bug. No gameplay changes.
